mapper.select: SELECT A.*, (SELECT CD_VAL FROM CODE WHERE CODE_IDX = A.CODE_IDX) AS CODE_NM FROM CLUB A WHERE A.CLUB_IDX=#{club_idx}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLUB_NEWS A WHERE 1=1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND (UPPER(A.TITLE) like '%'||UPPER(#{searchVal})||'%')
AND (UPPER(A.CONT) like '%'||UPPER(#{searchVal})||'%')
AND (UPPER(A.TITLE) like '%'||UPPER(#{searchVal})||'%' OR UPPER(A.CONT) like '%'||UPPER(#{searchVal})||'%')
SELECT A.*, G.P_IDX, G.P_NAME, G.NAME GRP_NAME FROM CLUB_NEWS A, GROUP_INFO G WHERE A.GROUP_IDX = G.GROUP_IDX AND A.CLUB_NEWS_IDX=#{club_news_idx}

SELECT A.*, G.P_IDX, G.P_NAME, G.NAME GRP_NAME, (SELECT CD_VAL FROM CODE WHERE CODE_IDX = A.CODE_IDX) AS CODE_NM FROM CLUB_STATUS A, GROUP_INFO G WHERE A.GROUP_IDX = G.GROUP_IDX AND A.CLUB_STATUS_IDX=#{club_status_idx}

SELECT A.*, (SELECT NAME FROM ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = A.REG_ID) REG_NM FROM CLUB_NEWS A WHERE A.CLUB_NEWS_IDX= ( SELECT MIN(CLUB_NEWS_IDX) FROM CLUB_NEWS WHERE CLUB_NEWS_IDX > #{club_news_idx} AND USE_YN = 'Y' )

SELECT A.*, (SELECT NAME FROM ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = A.REG_ID) REG_NM FROM CLUB_NEWS A WHERE A.CLUB_NEWS_IDX= ( SELECT MAX(CLUB_NEWS_IDX) FROM CLUB_NEWS WHERE CLUB_NEWS_IDX < #{club_news_idx} AND USE_YN = 'Y' )
